0.6.1.name: wordpress/shopadder
0.6.1.description:
Add a shop to your WP site/blog without screwing up your design. Safe and professional, no need to change your WP config, or any PHP or CSS files!

  • As simple as possible:
    1. Install the free WordPress plugin.
    2. Type {productid} at any place you like...
    3. ... sell your products!
  • Automatically included in your site:

    Live stock, Multi language, OnePageCheckout, international tax, Credit Cards, One backoffice - multiple shops, Multi product variants with own prices and Advanced discounts and (personalized) coupons. Default SSL encrypted connections. No cookies required. etc. etc.

  • In your existing WP design!
    1. No overhauling of your site.
    2. No messing with already running scripts.
